page.title: 04INDUSTRIAL SOUTH SPONDON
page.content: There are three industries in the southern area of {SPONDON}the smallest of which consists of {a depot for the {collection and distribution of {sheepskins}for the manufacture of coats and mats for sale in Europe.There is also {a printing works which supplies the world with soup labels and sweet wrappers using a Â£1million machine controlled by computer.{The chemical plant,}of which part is in this block, makes fabrics, paints,plastics and medicines as well as chemicals.This firm has been a major employer in the area but has cut back drastically in recent years.An employee expressed the opinion that 'the company had put{SPONDON }on the map, but it was a hot and potentially dangerous place to work.The company provides jobs for school leavers and runs a social club and fishing club.'
